variables.TemplateUsage: Is used to create virtual machine monitoring rules.

source.query:
[concat('let ResourceGroupName = "/resourcegroups/', resourceGroup().name, '/";
Heartbeat
| where _ResourceId contains ResourceGroupName
| summarize LastHeartbeat=max(TimeGenerated) by Computer 
| where LastHeartbeat < ago(5m)')]

resources.name: [concat('Logical Disk - Current Disk Queue Length - Critical (', resourceGroup().name, ')')]

properties.description: [concat('Logical Disk - Current Disk Queue Length - Critical (', resourceGroup().name, ')')]

properties.description: [concat('Logical Disk - Current Disk Queue Length - Warning (', resourceGroup().name, ')')]

source.query:
[concat('let ResourceGroupName = "/resourcegroups/', resourceGroup().name, '/";
Perf
| where _ResourceId contains ResourceGroupName
| where ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" 
| where CounterName == "Current Disk Queue Length" 
| where InstanceName <> "_Total" and InstanceName <> "HarddiskVolume1"
//| where TimeGenerated > ago(15m)
| summarize AggregatedValue=avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), Computer, InstanceName
| where AggregatedValue  < 5')]
